p: Two patients discontinued in the first treatment cycle and withdrew consent for further follow-up. For the 28 remaining patients, the 1-year rate of relapse or progressive disease during treatment was 21% (n = 6). Three of these 6 patients relapsed during the first treatment cycle ( Figure 1). The 3 patients who had â‰¥ 5% bone marrow blasts at the time of transplant all relapsed on-study, 1 of whom relapsed during treatment cycle 1. The 1-year cumulative incidence of relapse was 3 of 7 (43%) in the combined 7-day dosing group and 3 of 23 (13%) in the combined 14-day dosing group. One-year RPFS rates were 54% and 72% in the 7-day and 14-day CC-486 dosing groups, respectively.
